1.content:
There are many worlds in existence, but only a few shall we explore... Choose which one to view, and we may begin.

Set 1:
         Overlord Tails in Disguise: Early in Tails' life, Sonic died at the hands of Dr. Robotnik, who took the young inventor in as his pupil... Tails' good hearted nature and his tutelage under Robotnik often came into conflict, until finally, an accident occurred which ended in the Doctor's death by Tails' own hands... Tails soon realized that the world was descending into chaos without somebody to rally against as a common enemy... So he took up the mantle. His experimentation resulted in a device which could attach to a subject's back to open access to their mind... Which he used on his old friends who now tried to stop him, despite his newly founded 'evil empire' only being a front... Now he plays both sides, the leaders of both using his invention. Will the others find out?

         Tails, the Curious Inventor: Tails has stumbled upon a way to duplicate his friends into a living suit, complete with memories. Will others get their hands on this technology?

         Tails Suit Gun and Gloves: Tails has invented a pair of devices which allows him to open up a subject and crawl into their body, or perhaps just make them hollow with no seam... There are many settings to these things, and are ripe for unintended consequences...


Sets 2 - 5 have yet to be set. This page will be updated as more settings are added!

111.content:
Tails squirmed from within the body he occupied as they went along with their daily lives... He made as many appearances as he needed to so people knew he was not yet dead, but he preferred his time be spent inside of those he had planted into the resistance group, the Freedom Fighters... Robotnik was more important than anybody had ever cared to guess. His death brought about a year of peace... But soon after that, relations between nations began to break down. They began as petty, small things and just began to grow and grow... With Sonic gone, all Tails had known was what the doctor had taught him... So he put it to use.

For years now, he had acted as that driving force, the one which the nations were able to rally together and try to eliminate... They would never succeed, of course, Tails was simply too clever for them. And now, with his new invention, they would never be able to find him. His host climbed into the shower after stripping off her clothes, Tails chuckling and having her cup her breasts and running her fingers along her body... They'd never know it was his idea to have her do it... Not unless he chose to reveal himself.

He continued to ponder his past as his host began to clean herself up, acting on her own... It wasn't long after he took up the void of power Robotnik had left behind that he developed this technology... And a good thing as well... The Freedom Fighters would have ruined everything... They thought they were attacking his Biological Warfare research lab, when instead... It had been a place to develop a cure for a plague that ailed the land, which he would have secretly distributed... For you see, he was not in this position for the power, the wealth, the fame or even to rule the world... It was for the greater good, to be a symbol to rally against... And so, he still did what he could to help those people he regularly 'threatened'... Ah, if only he had another week before they decided to attack it... But now, they were his pawn, his host.

info.brief_description: Tails has developed tech which allows him to either copy or transform others as suits
info.description:
There is not one world in existence, but many. These worlds or 'Zones' each have their own versions of the way events played out. Some for the better, some for the worse... In some of these Zones, Miles 'Tails' Prower has developed a technology which allows him to either copy a person's form to develop a costume or else turn that person into one... These tales are an exploration of Tails' invention and the results of said technology.

Rules
1. Sex, fondling, masturbation, etc. is allowed and encouraged. The only restrictions are no scat (or other non-sexual bodily fluids), hardcore vore (Being descriptive with the eating process) or incest. Softcore vore (basic descriptions and nothing more), especially as a method of suiting, is fine.
2. Please, use proper grammar and full sentences.
3. No 'choice' chapters, except for the first few in deciding which version of the story to pursue. Many of these will be left open, but no choice chapters past the first set of Two Chapters Only. (I.E.: Once the After that, all chapters must move the story forward in some way.
4. Tails is just the one who developed the technology, other characters may use it and other characters may be the focus of the story.
5. All characters are over 18 years of age.

I reserve the right to edit or delete chapters which do not follow these rules. If you follow them, though, I'll leave them alone and you can be as imaginative as you'd like!
